Title: Kitsunegari
Plot: Pusher returns as Robert Patrick Modell escapes from the mental hospital and the FBI promptly organizes a manhunt, assuming that he will continue where he left off. But is he really trying to get revenge on Mulder, or does he want to warn him of another evil?
GuestStars: Scott Oughterson, Ty Olsson, Kurt Evans, Donna Yamamoto, Stuart O'Connell, Richard Leacock, Michael Dobson, Michelle Hart, Steven Jones, Clare Lipinskie, Gail Anderson, John Dadey, Jill Krop, Mark Holden, Diana Sca
